topic.title: EMS Vital Signs Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67801-1" EMS Vital Signs Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10252)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Vital Signs" (CONF:10254)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10255)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain at least one [1..*] organizer (CONF:10256)
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10257)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10258)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67518-1" Obtained prior to units EMS care (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10273)
This component Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10259)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10277), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.20 STATIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10278), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ECGType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.19 STATIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10260)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8480-6" Intravascular systolic (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10280)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10281)
UCUM units SHOULD be "mm[Hg]".
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10261)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8462-4" Intravascular diastolic (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10282)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10283)
UCUM units SHOULD be "mm[Hg]".
Such organizers SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10262)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10285)/@code="8867-4" Heart rate (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10284)
This component SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type PQ (CONF:10286)
UCUM units SHOULD be "/min".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10263)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="9279-1" Breaths (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10287)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10288)
UCUM units SHOULD be "/min".
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10264)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8310-5" Body temperature (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10289)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10290)
UCUM units SHOULD be "Cel".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10265)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="2710-2" Oxygen saturation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10291)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:10292)
UCUM units will typically be "%".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10266)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10294)/@code="19889-5" Carbon dioxide/Gas.total.at end expiration (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10293)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value (CONF:10295)
UCUM units will typically be "%".
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10267)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10297)/@code="19911-7" Diffusion capacity.carbon monoxide (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10296)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10298)
UCUM units will typically be "[ppm]".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10268)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10300)/@code="2339-0" Glucose (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10299)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10301)
UCUM units will typically be "mg/dl".
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10269)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10303)/@code="67775-7" Level of responsiveness (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10302)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10305), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet LevelOfResponsiveness 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.21 STATIC (CONF:10304)
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10270)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="56840-2" Pain severity verbal numeric scale (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10306)
This component Contains exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT
An ordinal value between 0 and 10, inclusive. There are three scales, but the values are equivalent.
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10271)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10308)/@code="67520-7" Stroke scale overall interpretation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10307)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10310), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Stroke Scale Score 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.93 STATIC (CONF:10309)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.29
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10312), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet StrokeScale 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.88 STATIC (CONF:10311)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.30
Such organizers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10272)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10313)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10325)/@code="9267-6" Glasgow coma score.eye opening (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10324)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CO (CONF:10326), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet GCS eye response 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.99 STATIC (CONF:10327)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10314)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10328)/@code="9268-4" Glasgow coma score.motor (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10329)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CO (CONF:10330), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet GCS motor response 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.96 STATIC (CONF:10331)
This component MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10315)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10322)/@code="55285-1" Glasgow coma score special circumstances (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10321)
This component MAY contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10323)
This component SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10316)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10319)/@code="9269-2" Glasgow coma score.total (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10318)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10320)
Integer value equal to the sum of verbal, motor, and eye
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:10317)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10332)/@code="9270-0" Glasgow coma score.verbal (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10333)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CO (CONF:10334), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet GCS verbal response 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.98 STATIC (CONF:10335)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.23"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1867656976"/> <code code="67801-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS Vital Signs Section"/> <title>EMS Vital Signs</title> <text/> <entry> <organizer> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </organizer> </entry> </section>
